ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمْ جَهَنَّمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنْهَا مَحِيصًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The shelter of such people will be Hell. They will find no way to escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For such the abode is only Hell from which they will find no escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For these people, their abode shall be Hell and from there they shall find no way of escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such people will dwell in hell fire from which they will not be able to escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The destination for such is hell; they will not find any refuge from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The dwelling of such (people) is Hell, and they will find no way of escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they whose abode is hell, and they shall not find any refuge from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Such men -- their refuge shall be Gehenna, and they shall find no asylum from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For such, their habitation will be hell, and they will find no refuge therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Hell shall be their home: they shall find no refuge from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These: their resort shall be Hell, and they shall not find therefrom an escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The refuge of such shall be hell, and they will not find any escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They (his dupes) will have their dwelling in Hell, and from it they will find no way of escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The dwelling of such (people) is Hell, and they will find no way of escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those, their shelter will be Gehenna (Hell), and from it they shall find no refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These—their place is Hell, and they will find no escape from it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The refuge of those will be Hell, and they will not find from it an escape.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:121] For such — their abode shall be Hell, and they shall find no refuge from it, no alternative [to it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For such) for the unbelievers, (their habitation) their dwelling (will be hell, and they will find no refuge therefrom) they will find no escape or sanctuary.
